hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #the Pocket Egg# can be found at #Zora's River#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Deku Tree# hoards #a Zora Scale#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that a #spider behind a muddy wall# in a grotto holds #a Piece of Heart#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #a Deku Stick# and #the Prelude of Light#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Bottom of the Well Compass#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Deku Shield#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that plundering #Gerudo's Fortress# is a foolish choice.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that ##Kakariko Village## has #5# major items.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# is on the path to #Phantom Ganon#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Front Center Bombable Chest

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #the Death Mountain Trail# is on the way of the hero.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: Did you know that the Discord server has a public Plandomizer library?

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #Pierre atop the Fire Temple# hides #a Small Key#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Hyrule Castle# is on the path to #the Tower#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that inside #Jabu Jabu#, one can find #the Bottom of the Well#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Piece of Heart# and #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that plundering #the Forest Temple# is a foolish choice.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: It would be a shame if something... unfortunate... were to happen to you.^Have you considered saving lately?

SFM (Saria).text: They say that #the Sacred Forest Meadow# is on the way of the hero.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #Bombchus (5 pieces)#.
